FFI 2019 Akan Berbeda dari FFI Sebelumnya, Banyak Kegiatan Seru
07 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Chitra Paramaesti, Rini Kustiani
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Festival Film Indonesia atau FFI 2019 akan berlangsung pada pekan kedua Desember mendatang. Festival Film Indonesia tahun ini akan berbeda dari festival sebelumnya karena diisi dengan berbagai aktivitas seru.
Ketua Komite FFI 2018 - 2020 Lukman Sardi mengatakan berbagai kegiatan menarik akan mengiringi Festival Film Indonesia hingga acara puncak agar ajang penghargaan bagi insan film ini lebih dekat dengan masyarakat. "Kami melakukan beberapa terobosan supaya lebih bisa menggaet perhatian masyarakat," kata Lukman Sardi di Gedung Tempo Jakarta, Rabu 6 November 2019.
Aneka kegiatan yang melibatkan masyarakat antara lain 'menjadi sutradara mendadak', parade para pemain film, sampai skoring film. Aktivitas itu rencananya dilakukan di beberapa stasiun MRT dan ruang publik lainnya.
Lukman Sardi menceritakan gagasan permainan 'menjadi sutradara dadakan' diperoleh saat dia menyaksikan bagaimana agar anak muda di London, Inggris, lebih mengenal musik klasik. Saat itu, di salah satu stasiun kereta di London, ada orkestra Philharmonic yang setiap personelnya sudah siap sedia dengan alat musik.
Hanya satu yang kurang, yakni siapa konduktornya? Di sebelah personel Philharmonic tersedia sebuah papan digital yang memuat berbagai lagu. Arahan yang tercantum di atas papan digital itu singkat dan padat, "conduct me".
Walhasil, siapapun yang melewati papan itu kemudian memilih lagu, maka dialah konduktornya. Dan otomatis para pemain orkestra akan membawakan lagu yang ditentukan sang konduktor. Dari situ mulailah masyarakat, terutama anak muda, mengenali dan dapat mendengar langsung seperti apa musik klasik.
Aktivitas 'menjadi sutradara dadakan' dalam FFI 2019 nanti kurang lebih sama seperti contoh tadi. Akan ada beberapa pemain yang mengikuti arahan seorang sutradara dadakan. Dengan begitu, masyarakat tahu bagaimana proses pembuatan film dengan segala pernak-perniknya.
Perihal pawai artis, Lukman Sardi mengatakan rencananya sejumlah aktris dan aktor akan mempromosikan FFI 2019 di sejumlah stasiun MRT.
Saat ini, Komite FFI 2019 sedang melakukan seleksi dan hitung suara untuk memilih film, aktor, dan aktris, hingga penulis naskah terbaik. Lukman Sardi menjelaskan, perhitungan suara tersebut dapat diikuti seluruh anggota FFI yang jumlahnya lebih dari 500 orang.
text:
FFI 2019 Will Be Different From Previous FFI, Many Exciting Activities
Nov 7 2019, 06:00 by Chitra Paramaesti, Rini Kustiani
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The Indonesian Film Festival or FFI 2019 will take place in the second week of December. This year's Indonesian Film Festival will be different from the previous festival because it is filled with a variety of exciting activities.
Chair of the 2018-2020 FFI Committee Lukman Sardi said various interesting activities would accompany the Indonesian Film Festival to the top event so that the awards for the filmmakers would be closer to the public. "We made a number of breakthroughs so that we could be more able to attract the attention of the public," said Lukman Sardi at the Tempo Building in Jakarta, Wednesday, November 6, 2019.
Various activities that involve the community include 'being a director suddenly', a parade of film players, to scoring films. The activity is planned to be carried out at several MRT stations and other public spaces.
Lukman Sardi recounted the idea of the game 'being an impromptu director' when he witnessed how young people in London, England, were more familiar with classical music. At that time, at one of the train stations in London, there was a Philharmonic orchestra where every personnel was ready with musical instruments.
Only one thing is lacking, namely who is the conductor? Next to the Philharmonic personnel is a digital board that contains various songs. The directions listed on the digital board are brief and concise, "conduct me".
As a result, whoever passes the board then chooses a song, he is the conductor. And automatically the orchestra performers will bring the song determined by the conductor. From there began the community, especially young people, recognize and can hear firsthand what kind of classical music.
The activity of 'becoming an impromptu director' in FFI 2019 will be more or less the same as the example above. There will be some players who follow the direction of an impromptu director. That way, the public knows how the process of making films with all of its trinkets.
Regarding the artist march, Lukman Sardi said that it is planned that a number of actresses and actors will promote FFI 2019 at a number of MRT stations.
Currently, the 2019 FFI Committee is conducting a selection and vote count to select films, actors and actresses, to the best screenwriters. Lukman Sardi explained that the vote count could be attended by all FFI members, numbering more than 500 people.
